import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { UserGroupIcon, HomeIcon, EyeIcon, CheckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const RoomSummaryTable = () => { const roomTypes = [ { type: 'Double Standard', capacity: '2 pers.', mainAmenities: ['DuÈ™', 'Minibar', 'Balcon'], view: 'Munte', price: '65 USD', size: 'â‰ˆ20 mÂ²' }, { type: 'Double de Lux', capacity: '2 pers.', mainAmenities: ['CadÄƒ', 'Pat matrimonial'], view: 'Munte', price: '95 USD', size: 'â‰ˆ26 mÂ²' }, { type: 'MatrimonialÄƒ', capacity: '2 pers.', mainAmenities: ['Pat mare', 'Balcon'], view: 'Munte / OraÈ™', price: '85 USD', size: 'â‰ˆ24 mÂ²' }, { type: 'Single', capacity: '1 pers.', mainAmenities: ['DuÈ™', 'Wi-Fi'], view: 'OraÈ™ / Interior', price: '45 USD', size: 'â‰ˆ16 mÂ²' } ]; return (
